title: Cassius
description: CASSIUSShe's stubborn, but as sexy as hell and she's mine. They try to hurt her, and all bets are off. They have no idea the fury that i will unleash. They will all answer to me, only then will they see the monster that they have created. SCARLETTHe can fight me all he wants, I know I'm meant to be with him and sooner or later he will give in. He thinks he's protecting me by trying to stay away, but he can't resist, the pull is too strong. He thinks he's broken because of what he went through, but what he doesn't know is that I am too. Maybe, we can both finally find peace. CASSIUS is a steamy possessive, alpha male romance with guaranteed HEA, no cheating, and no cliffhanger! This book is the sixth book in the Elemental's MC series
author: Alexi Ferreira
